response.overview: First result of a series of films in which I focus on filming a 360Â° tour with the camera on its own axis. This time, portraying Plaza Sol in Madrid at two different times. Moving in one direction, I shoot three frames for each shot, leaving the next three frames unexposed. Weeks later, through the process of manually rewinding the reel, I take back the black frames and shoot them in the opposite direction. An attempt to create a tension between opposite directions, both of the camera and the filmed bodies.
response.title: Sol
